name: Chisinau Public Transport
description:
Chisinau Public Transport - a simulation of public transportation services in Chisinau. The main idea of the game is that you are a driver and start your carrier as a MiniBus Driver. Your job is to collect money from the road (lei - national currency). After collecting money, you can buy other types of vehicles: bus or taxi. Each has its own advantage and disadvantage.

Passenger revenue is based on the type of your transport.

  • Buses - 3lei
  • Trolleybus - 2lei
  • Taxi - 20lei.

There are 3 types of buses/1 trolleybus/1 taxi.
